#summary Sets the firing rate for the tesla trap.
#labels D-Cvar

= Description =

Sets the firing rate for the tesla trap. Value set is the delay between fires, so default of 0.3 = 3.3333... fires per second, 0.1 (minimum) would be 10/sec.
